General.Name: 2CRSI S.A.
General.Description: 2CRSI S.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and develops computing solutions in France and internationally. The company offers IT solutions and services for cloud computing, datacenters, enterprise IT, big data, HPC, artificial intelligence, 5G, IoT, and rugged PCs, as well as embedded and edge computing markets; and hardware solutions, datacenter housing and cloud services, and IT consultancy and solutions. It also provides rackmount and OCP servers, and fanless workstations. In addition, the company offers air, direct liquid, and immersion cooling; data science; artificial intelligence, and cloud gaming solutions, as well as professional, hosted, and HPC managed services. 2CRSI S.A. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Strasbourg, France.
